description: Karl Cameron, who admitted breaking Manx emergency coronavirus laws, is starting a six-week term.
title: Coronavirus Isle of Man: Man jailed for accepting a lift to the chemist's
title_page: Coronavirus Isle of Man: Man jailed for accepting a lift to the chemist's - BBC News
maintext: The court heard Cameron had made an "honest mistake" by getting into the car because he thought "getting a lift from a friend was not different from getting a taxi" - something he had done earlier that day.
